it clearly says there mate

if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)){
deleteItem(995, 5000);

995 = coins mate and 5000 is ammount so delete this

if(donator == 0){
if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)){
deleteItem(995, 5000);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sM(“Choose your char look.”);
} else {
sM(“You need 5,000 coins to chage your character skin.”);
}
}

item.title: Code error?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

i added this code. but if i walk with others npc its says:
“You need 5,000 coins to chage your character skin.”
why?

if(NPCID == 599){
if(donator == 1){
sM(“Choose a new character skin.”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
}
}
if(donator == 0){
if(playerHasItem(995, 5000)){
deleteItem(995, 5000);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
sM(“Choose your char look.”);
} else {
sM(“You need 5,000 coins to chage your character skin.”);
}
}
